name: Wander with Madness
description:
Journey through a dark landscape in this short adventure game. Keep moving forward to put your demons to rest.

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Movement
Z - Attack
X - Secondary item
C - Dash (when unlocked)
I - Inventory

Credits:
Sound Effects:

Goblin Scream: Spookymodem

Ghost: Ogrebane

Zombie Attack Sound: Proxy Games

Retro Monster Roar: Greg300

Bear Growls: AntumDeluge

Music:

Creepy Forest (F): Brandon Morris

Deep Humidity: TinyWorlds

A Cold Wind: Umplix

Death Waltz: northivanastan

Boss Battle #6 Metal: nene

Boss Battle #2 [Symphonic Metal]: nene

ver. 1.0.0.2
